data.title: SMARTPJU (Penerangan Jalan Umum)
data.description: Sea Cinema is a movie ticket booking application that allows users to browse and book movie tickets conveniently. With its intuitive interface and seamless functionality, Sea Cinema provides a hassle-free movie ticket booking experience.
